Accurate Built-in GPS

The Zeblaze Swim Smartwatch supports four satellite positioning systems to help you make the most of your journeys into the great outdoors and uses circularly-polarized antenna technology to improve positioning performance and accuracy. The stylish, lightweight body with a simple plastic ring insert also acts as an antenna signal booster for the built-in GPS. Assisted GPS for faster fix times: supporting GPS, GLONASS, Galileo, and Beidou satellite systems for the best positioning experience anywhere in the world.

Pool and Open Water Swimming

The Zeblaze Swim comes with a water-resistance grade of 5 ATM means the Zeblaze Swim can resist the equivalent of up to 50 meters of water pressure. And whenever you fancy a trip to the pool or the beach, the watch's Pool Swimming and Open Water Swimming sports modes can scientifically track your swimming data. Zeblaze Swim is a GPS swimming smartwatch that tracks distance, pace, stroke count, stroke frequency, SWOLF, and more in the pool and open water.

Multiple Sports Modes

Swimming, Walking, Running, Cycling, Yoga, and more. Whichever activity makes you challenge yourself, you'll likely find a sports mode for it on the Zeblaze Swim. The Zeblaze Swim is equipped with a new self-developed motion algorithm. Zeblaze Lily Women Smart Watch

The Zeblaze Lily Women Smart Watch is is an excellent Smart Watch from the brand Zeblaze.The Zeblaze Lily can proficiently handle your agendas, notify you of incoming calls or messages, and provide movement reminders when you have been sitting for too long. The watch will also track your events, offer Do Not Disturb, stopwatch, and weather forecast functions, and enable the setting of alarms and timers.. This particular smartwatch model is specially made for women's usage. This is why this watch comes with some women-centric features. This Round dialed smartwatch is specifically designed for women only. This watch has a Borderless design That uses exquisitely crafted curved glass. but apart from that, This watch supports a variety of features and customizable options. The Aluminum made dial is Pink colored. The Display is a borderless IPS panel 1.09 Inch screen that supports the screen resolution of 240 x 240 pixels. This smartwatch is compatible with Android and IOS Operating systems. This watch comes with various sensors like the Heart-rate, Proximity, and Accelerometer sensor. This smartwatch supports Bluetooth Version 5.0 as a form of connectivity. But it does not have Bluetooth calling, NFC, or GPS. but this watch has 9 Multi-sports modes with a real-time Heart rate monitor, Blood Oxygen Monitor, Sleep monitor, cycle monitor, and more. This watch is IP68 Waterproof. The supported apps include Sedentary reminders, Sleep monitors, Alarms, Barometer, Brightness Adjusting, etc. The Battery Capacity is180 mAh. with a Normal Usage of around 2-3 days. This smartwatch utilizes an App named GloryFit. This app is compatible with both Android and iOS. This watch has interchangeable Straps made with Silicone. with the basic watch mode. The 180 mAh Battery can last up to 4 days on a single charge. The dimensions of this smartwatch are 46.3 x 40.5 x 11.4 mm. This watch weighs around 22.0 g. Zeblaze Lily has no warranty.

full_description:
Zeblaze GTS Pro Smart Watch

The New Zeblaze GTS Pro is an improved version of Zeblaze GTS with a better display, more than 20 sports modes, longer battery life, and reduced case thickness. The new 1.65" large HD display has a resolution of 240x295 pixels and is protected by durable curved 2.5D glass. The watch case is made of metal and is only 9.5 mm thick. Zeblaze GTS Pro smartwatch provides 24/7 heart rate monitoring, SpO2 oxygen saturation monitoring, and blood pressure monitoring. 24 sports modes will help you to exercise more effectively both indoors and outdoors. The watch displays incoming call notifications and messages and reminds you of events scheduled in your calendar. Battery life is up to 15 days in power saving mode and up to 9 days with round-the-clock heart rate monitoring, activate Bluetooth, and all additional functions. Zeblaze GTS Pro watch is protected from dust and water according to IP67 standards. By downloading the GloryFit App, you can monitor everything directly from your mobile phone. It has no warranty.

title: Zeblaze GTR Smartwatch

full_description:
Zeblaze GTR Smartwatch

The Zeblaze GTR smartwatch comes with a round color 1.3" IPS 240x240 display that is protected by 2.5D glass and housed in a durable metal case. The watch will monitor your heart's work around the clock and immediately signal if there are any abnormalities. With this smartwatch, you can check your blood pressure at any time. You can view all collected data for any period on a connected smartphone. The built-in calendar of the female cycle will relieve you of unnecessary worries. The watch will be a great companion for both works and play or sports because it is equipped with ten built-in sports modes. If you are used to listening to music on the go or your training, you no longer have to take out your smartphone to switch music. Now you can do it right on the screen of your watch. Also, right on the watch screen, you can read incoming messages or notifications from social networks. The watch can help with a complete report on the duration and quality of your sleep. The watch will mark the time of falling asleep, waking up, and monitoring the phases of sleep. The Zeblaze GTR smartwatch has long a battery life. It lasts 30 days of battery life in power-saving mode or 18 days in normal use. This long run time is achieved by using the latest energy-efficient GOODDIX GR5515 chip. Smartwatch takes only an hour and a half to charge the watch battery fully. You can safely immerse this watch in water to a depth of up to 30 meters. They are also not afraid of heat and frost. The operating temperature range is from -20Â°C to 45Â°C. It has no warranty.

Zeblaze Ares 2 Rugged Smartwatch

Zeblaze Ares 2 Rugged Smartwatch is the newer iteration of the famous Zeblaze ARES rugged strong smart watches. It is essentially a retro-style smartwatch with good battery life. Although it precedes the ARES rugged smart watch; the main difference between Zeblaze Ares and the Ares 2 smartwatch is its design which is inspired by the style of classic Casio. It has a A high-quality rectangular color HD touch screen 240x240 px has 85% screen-to-body ratio.A fully-optimized battery management system provides up to 15 days of battery life for the Zeblaze Ares 2. This IP68 certified smartwatch also gets rid of the anxiety brought on by constant charging, and keep the energy flowing. You can install a watch face by choosing from many ready-made ones or creating your own. Two physical buttons make it easy to use the watch on the go. The watch can monitor your heart rate around the clock and keep track of your health. 13 built-in workout modes help you exercise by collecting and analyzing data about your activity and heart function. Zeblaze Ares will be a great helper in everyday life. They display notifications and messages that arrive on your smartphone. You can also control music without taking out your smartphone. This watch is very light, weighing only 33 grams. Battery life is up to 15 days. Communication with a smartphone is carried out using the Bluetooth 5.1 standard.The Zeblaze Ares 2 features a retro four-sided screen, equipped with two physical buttons and a design that provides the perfect balance of style and versatile functionality. It's the ideal combination of classic design and modern features. Zeblaze Ares 2 Rugged Smartwatch offers no warranty.

A new circuit design especially developed for Zeblaze Vibe 7, an advanced low power-consumption chip, and a deep power optimization give the Zeblaze Vibe 7 a longer battery life. full_description:
Zeblaze Stratos 2 AMOLED Display GPS Smartwatch

The Zeblaze Stratos 2 features a 1.3" AMOLED screen that rivals the best displays in the world. The 326 PPI pixel density makes the display clear, exquisite, and true-to-life, with vivid colors ensuring smooth readability. Match your mood, outfit, and occasion with a wide selection of more than 100+ stylish watch faces, all of which have an always-on matching display. Zeblaze Stratos 2 has excellent battery life thanks to the electronic components selection and power optimization technology.

Accurate Built-in GPS

The Zeblaze Stratos 2 has access to all four global satellite systems (GPS, GLONASS, GALILEO, and BEIDOU) to help you plan your perfect adventure, track routes, and guide you to your destination anywhere in the world.

Encompassing Care For Your Health

With the Zeblaze Stratos 2, you may obtain more precise and efficient health data. The sophisticated biometric sensor in the watch can track numerous health metrics at the same time and makes better use of optical light. Blood Oxygen Measurement + Blood oxygen saturation (Sp02) level indicates the amount of oxygen in the blood. Get a SpO2 measurement anytime, anywhere for peace of mind. The advanced heart rate sensor monitors heart rate accurately in real-time when you are active or at rest. Heart rate changes can also be logged on a weekly graph and sent an alert to detect any unusual heart rate changes.

Water Resistant 5 ATM

The Zeblaze Stratos 2 is on par with traditional high-end watches in terms of waterproofing, offering protection up to a depth of 50 meters, and may be worn worry-free for daily use or when swimming.
